projects.description: UNICEF: Significant progress was observed in improving facility-based deliveries, increasing from 58.93% in 2023 to 68.36% by November 2024. Similarly, the percentage of live births attended by skilled health personnel rose from 58.78% to 68.17%. Capacity-building initiatives, such as training on enhanced integrated community outreach, empowered 79 primary health facilities to reach children and pregnant women in hard-to-reach areas.
